theDefault: Focusfire.NAME: Focus fire
theDefault: Focusfire.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage twice. NL Magic 3 does !M! bonus damage.

theDefault: BattleSense.NAME: Battle Sense
theDefault: BattleSense.DESCRIPTION: Gain 1 Strength and 1 Dexterity. NL Gain an aditional Dexterity when upgraded

theDefault: ShortTerm.NAME: Short Term Investmenet
theDefault: ShortTerm.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Mana. NL At the end of your turn, lose 1 more than the Mana you have gained.

theDefault: Flare.NAME: Flare
theDefault: Flare.DESCRIPTION: apply 2 Vulnerable and remove 1 Strength on all enemies, NL When upgraded, apply an aditional Vulnerable

theDefault: Overhead.NAME: Overhead Swing
theDefault: Overhead.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage, if it kills, NL apply 1 Vulnerable and reduce the Strength of a random enemy by 1.

theDefault: DefaultAttackWithVariable.NAME: Special Strike
theDefault: DefaultAttackWithVariable.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage [R] times. NL (Deal !ENERGY_DAMAGE! damage total.)

theDefault: DefaultUncommonSkill.NAME: A better defend
theDefault: DefaultUncommonSkill.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Plated Armor. Affected by Dexterity.

theDefault: DefaultRareSkill.NAME: for each loop x2
theDefault: DefaultRareSkill.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! vulnerable to all enemies, 2 times.
theDefault: DefaultRareSkill.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! vulnerable to all enemies, 3 times.

theDefault: DefaultRarePower.NAME: In-Progress Form
theDefault: DefaultRarePower.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, play a TOUCH.
